reviews.text: I ordered the chicken and rice. 2 hours later I am throwing it all up. Paid $13 for this mess. It was either sitting out over night or they used spoiled ingredients. My stomach is fighting for its life right now. Never ever going back. sunday=ruined.
Authentic Jamaican food a good choice if your in that neighborhood

Authentic Jamaican cuisine served fresh and hot in a clean environment. Salish available daily for breakfast with cornmeal porridge on select days. Stewed chicken tasty and well seasoned. Employees are friendly.
One of the best tasteing  food in Brooklyn You won‚Äôt regret it
10/10 food

Literally the best oxtail I have ever had. It was tender, flavorful and cooked to perfection. The large plate was 22$ but my partner and I shared it and it was definitely e oh for the both of us. It comes with veggies, rice and peas and bananas. Veggies were crunchy and the perfect touch to balance out the meat. The rice and peas were plentiful and bananas were cooked fresh.  We also ordered a beef patty it was 3$ and had a nice spicy kick to it.

The food and the Staff are Amazing!!! Get the Oxtails.
Generous servings as well.
The chicken patties!!! Wow!!
Ida B
Saturday 3:28pm place is closed or out of business. It says on google maps open until 9pm.
When it comes on to good food! This is a place you need to eat
The food was good

Got some breakfast here (saltfish + ackee) when getting my car serviced nearby and it was absolutely delicious. Service was really friendly too. Cash only. Will definitely be back next time I'm in the area!
My experience was very gracious
Pleasant place, not expensive...great choices in dishes and it taste way better then most Restaurants... great food

Asked for a certain gravy on top of my food. I was told that I couldn't have it. They let me walk out without another suggestion. Rude woman. The men are better to deal with.
Ackee and Saltfish amazing in the morning..Try it...

Jamaican me happy! Came all the way from Cali to NYC on family trip. I googled this place and was excited to try them. Location was great it‚Äôs right on the corner of a main st. Parking was easy but hey it‚Äôs NYC so double park if you feel like it. This picture was just my food which was the oxtails DELICIOUS and SO TENDER! It was cooked to perfection and had so much seasoning and the gravy was yum yum. The plantains were sweet and good as well. I also got a side of yellow cake with my food which reminded me of cornbread but smoother and sweeter. My family order the curry goat which they said was the best they ever had. They also ordered some stew which they double backed for. The prices are very reasonable! Oh bring cash because that‚Äôs all they take but if not there is an ATM inside. Customer service could have been a little better but it didn‚Äôt stop me from giving them 5stars
Highly recommend this restaurant excellent customer service and good food!
My snapper was well seasoned. It was amazing. Staff was sweet. Takeout only. Price reasonable üôåüèæ‚Ä¶
Fresh hot food. Salt fish was boiled completely out so it lost the salt.  Just a little salt and its great. Porridge was good wish it had cinnamon in it though.
The food is obviously prepared with love, which is why I‚Äôll drive 30 plus minutes in traffic to get it
Nough good food
Food is amazing..bought the stew peas.. the taste was nostalgic, took me right back to Jamaica. The chef needs to give cooking lessons. The curry goat is amazing too..

I just happened to be in this corner of Brooklyn for a customer meeting and had a hankering for some Caribbean food. This place exceeded my expectations. The food was excellent! Curry goat was flavorful and spicy, rice and peas perfect,‚Ä¶

One of the BEST Jamaican Restaurants in Brooklyn! Every meal is tasty from Breakfast to Dinner! Oxtails are amazing! Porridge is superb!

I went on Google because i was craving for cornmeal porridge & i chose this restaurant.  My porridge was GREAT! They're customer service was also excellent. It's a hidden gem on E56th st right off of Clarendon rd.
Yummy Jamaican food.  Oxtail melted off the bone.
Food is homestyle and tastes great!

Excellent meals, cook to perfection,a real slice of Jamaica in a America, friendly staff ,fast and courteous service. Good job Mr.Calli.
If you love Jamaican food, great home cooking.  Take out only. Not expensive

I have been ordering food from this place every other Saturday for the past 3 years. the owner and his staff is wonderful,  the food is delicious and always fresh. we order on average of over 15 food .
Food is awesome and the people there is very kind. Everytime I go it's nothing but great food and laughs.
